combatdetails.TimeMaxHint: The time per turn in minutes, the maximum value is 30m per turn.
combatdetails.DisableNextUpHint: Remove notification about your next turn
combatdetails.DisableTimerHint: Completely disable timer feature at bottom of the screen
combatdetails.ShowEndTurnDialogHint: Displays a Dialog to players on their turn that provides a button to end their current turn
combatdetails.TickSoundHint: Create a ticking sound when the player's turn is running out of time
combatdetails.VolumeHintOld: Set the overall volume of the module
combatdetails.Turn: It's your turn, what would you like to do?
combatdetails.ShowNextUpHint: Show notification to the players that their turn is next
combatdetails.ShowCurrentUpHint: Show notification who has the current turn
combatdetails.VolumeHint: Set the overall volume of the module
combatdetails.PositionHint: Where to place the combat dialog when it opens, rather than the middle of the screen
combatdetails.PopoutCombatHint: When starting a combat, popout the dialog, and switch to the chat window
